column1: In the circumstances, this Court is of the view that the respective decrees of Partition
which the Petitioners claim title do not have the effect of final and conclusive against
the State. Accordingly, I am of the view that the Petitioners’ first argument fails.
In the above context, this Court needs to consider the Petitioners’ second argument,
whether a fair hearing has been given to the Petitioners before the issuance of the
impugned quit notices by the 1st Respondent.
